attributes.userName: this is a very terrible app
attributes.title: Do Not Download
attributes.review: This is an absolutely terrible and repulsive app that has many problems. This app has way to many glitches for it to run properly. This app also take an appallingly long time  to download it took approximately five hours just to download this app. I may also want to add that when you open the app you will encounter a horrendous looking orange man.

attributes.title: Hispanic lives matter .
attributes.review: I just wanted to say that this app has the worst quality . When I opened the app it’s just took me to an orange screen . My phone was perfectly fine until I opened the app . I had full bars before I opened the app but once I opened the app it had the worst quality and it kept on glitching . Anyways that’s all I wanted to say abt this app .✨

attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for educational purposes and to search for reasons as to why Trump will make America great again for another four years and as I went through it was just disappointment after disappointment. The app spread misinformation and rumors. I would not recommend AT ALL if you are looking to actually learn something

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Usually I’m not one to criticize apps because I always give them a second chance. I heard about this app from a friend and decided to give it a try. But this is horrible, using your presidency for more fame is just unprofessional. I didn’t know to register and why this app is asking to many personal questions. I am no longer a trump supporter.

attributes.title: Worst app ever created
attributes.review: The app took 15 days to download and wouldn’t let me do anything else while it was downloading. When I opened the app it kept glitching and showing Simpsons pictures and playing Iranian music. This music attracted the Trump ninjas to my house and they kept screaming “MaKiNg AmErIcA gReAt AgAiN” while watching lynching videos and laughing. 0/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: No❤️😘💕🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and as soon as i did, the purge siren started going off, my dog started floating, and i ate everything in my house. i am now sick on the bathroom floor. i am 💕disgusted💕 that the president would even have this app in the store. my phone is glitching so much since i downloaded this app. i am severely disappointed that i am not allowed to support my Oompa Loompa by downloading this app.

attributes.title: SCARED FOR LIFE
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. i downloaded this to support our wonderful orange president but only to find out it would be the worst experience ever. The second i downloaded i knew something was off in my phone. my phone started glitching and showing glimpses of trump. i was AFRAID. i had to delete the app but it still wouldn’t go AWAY. now i have to suffer with seeing trump occasionally on my screen. THIS IS OBSURD.

attributes.title: Black lives matter
attributes.review: I’ve been using this app for a few days now. There’s nothing very good about it. Every time I go to click on it nothing happens. I was really looking forward to using this app. I have to give it a one star because it just isn’t that good. There’s nothing special about it. I don’t even want to try and use it “again.”

attributes.title: Sad day
attributes.review: I wanted to try and give trump2020 a try. My mom and her husband (not my dad) both think that I’m like this crazy liberal chick. So I thought that maybe I can learn more about their online culture with trump so that maybe I could join so they would love me more. But the app kept glitching and now it’s a sad day because the app doesn’t work and they will never love me.

attributes.title: Terrible terrible app it was A HUGE mistake in my part for downloading
attributes.review: I was expecting and exquisite app that helped maybe find some good reason to vote for our president. But I couldn’t even find one I mean that could be because there isn’t any. Other than that it launched a virus on to my phone. Cause my phone to now constantly glitch. And over ride.
